column4: I just got a new monitor, native resolution '1920 x 1080', but my max available resolution is '1680x1050'. Using 10.04, and I can't find xorg.conf. How do I get '1920 x 1080'?
Which graphics driver are you using?
I'm using a HD4850 with the ATI drivers.
Since fglrx supports xrandr1.2 at least, you may be able to add the new mode with xrandr, though it would only be active for that session. If it works, then you can put a mode line in your xorg.conf
